name: SpaceDelivery
description:
You are a spaceship and your goal is to collect figures in space and bring them to the right planet according to the instructions that you will see. Yes, you have read it right; triangles, squares and other shapes will be your precious cargo. You have to be both quick and precise because you have limited fuel and after you use it all, your game will end with no other option that floating in space.

Use the arrows to move your spaceship and the space-bar to zoom out and see the system and orientate yourself.
